problem.markdown: Go to your Student's Book (colored pages). On page 82, circle the verbs that you find in the past simple form. After, check how was it: (x) Mark as done. ( ) I don't know how to do. [explanation] Verbs 1- flew 2- traveled 3- took off 4- didn't stop 5- landed 6- didn't use 7- offered 8- entered 9- didn't finish 10- had 11- was 12- couldn't take off 13- changed [explanation]
problem.p: Go to your Student's Book (colored pages).
On page 82, circle the verbs that you find in the past simple form.

choicegroup.choice: I don't know how to do.
